name: OVERKILL (itch) (Beez, kevenece, Kizilejderha)
description:
Caution

The amount of pixel blood in the game might be disturbing. There is an option to turn it off inside the options menu.

How To Play

Press the buttons that appear at the bottom of the screen during the fight to interrupt the enemy attacks. The player can attack freely.

Controls

WASD Equivalent/Arrow Keys: Dodge Directions

Spacebar/K Equivalent: Attack

Interaction: Left Mouse Button
